rooms.description: Centrally located room with open space for communal living, designed in Traditional Kerala style with wooden beams and natural finishes. Openings include large windows facing the north or east to promote positive Vastu energy.
Spacious master bedroom located on the southwest corner ensuring a quiet environment. It includes built-in wardrobes and window placements as per Vastu recommendations for restful sleep.
Adjacent to the master bedroom, this room follows traditional Kerala design with coir matting and natural ventilation. Openings are designed to ensure good sunlight exposure.
Traditional Kerala style bathroom with stone finishes; positioned away from main entrance as per Vastu, ensuring privacy and proper drainage.
Small living area for servants located near the kitchen or service entrance, integrating simple Kerala design elements with functional space planning.
Dedicated home office designed with a quiet environment and natural light; ideally placed in a corner away from noisy areas to enhance productivity and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large windows installed on north and east sides for optimal sunlight, ventilation and energy balance as per traditional Kerala style and Vastu principles.
Traditional wooden doors with secure locking mechanisms ensuring privacy and adherence to building norms.

rooms.description: An extra bedroom on the first floor providing additional space. Designed following Kerala architectural style with natural materials and proper Vastu placement.
Terrace area for relaxation, overlooking the surrounding landscape; integrates Kerala aesthetics with open design and ample natural ventilation.

openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring adequate light and cross-ventilation on the first floor.
